paper.title: A critical study on relationship of EPS and stock price
paper.abstract: This critical study is focused to analyse the causality between EPS and SP in Indian stock market. Now a day, industrialist and academicians are curious to know whether EPS have positive or negative relationship with SP, main reason behind their curiosity is to remove risk and increase return on investment. It is also a rule of investment that only those companies can provide high rate of return on investment those financial performance is sound enough. To check the relationship regression analysis and cointegration test have been applied with the help of Eviews and sample of 115 companies has been taken for the study. Secondary data of EPS and SP have been collected for the period of 19 years. Results of study indicated that both have significant relationship between them and also EPS influence the SP. (C) 2020 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究EPS与股票价格之间的关系，虽然涉及投资回报和风险，但其核心研究并不直接涉及衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理。
